name: The Birds Vs. The Bees
description:
Your goal is it keep at least one beehive alive for as long as you can.

Whenever you build a new beehive, some of your bees will go off and construct it. The amount of bees will increase the more beehives you already have.

Beehives once fully built will create more bees for your spawn, but they'll also attract more birds.

Bird will fly off once they're hit 3 times, or once they've destroyed a beehive.

Your final score counted by how many birds flew in.
